case_vignette: A 28-year-old man comes to the physician for the evaluation of five episodes of painful oral ulcers over the past year. There is no personal or family history of serious illness. He emigrated to the US from Syria with his family four years ago. He is sexually active with one female partner and they do not use condoms.
